game.name: Train Simulator: Amtrak P40DC Loco Add-On
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam 트레이딩 카드, Steam 창작마당, 앱 내 구매, Steam Cloud, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Through the craftsmanship of accomplished developer DTM, the original version of the stylish Genesis diesel – the P40DC (also often called the Dash 8-40BP) comes to Train Simulator Classic along with an all-new complete Amtrak Superliner consist!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Through the craftsmanship of accomplished developer DTM, the original version of the stylish Genesis diesel – the P40DC (also often called the Dash 8-40BP) comes to Train Simulator Classic along with an all-new complete Amtrak Superliner consist!
